name: HTTP Status Dogs
description: A free API providing dog images for HTTP status codes to enhance error messages on websites

about.overview: HTTP Status Dogs API offers dog images corresponding to HTTP status codes, making error handling visually engaging for developers.
features: Supports multiple formats (JPG, WEBP, AVIF, JXL, JSON)
Covers a wide range of HTTP status codes
useCases: Educational tool for learning HTTP status codes

endpoints.description: Retrieve a dog image for a specific HTTP status code
Retrieve JSON data for a specific HTTP status code

quickStart: Visit https://http.dog/[code].jpg with a valid HTTP status code
Integrate the image or JSON directly into your application

authentication.description: No authentication required; access endpoints directly.
